title: COVID-19 Vaccine Resources
description: Learn more about the vaccines, their potential side effects, and how federal and state agencies are prioritizing distribution.
cleaned_text: Schedule a COVID-19 Vaccination Call to Schedule [Call (844) 987-6115](tel:+1-844-987-6115) and press 2 to speak with a representative. Our call center is open Monday - Friday, 7:00 am - 6:00 pm. For appointments at Memorial Hospital Los Banos, call (209) 710-6333, or at Sutter Lakeside Medical Practice, call (707) 262-5088. [Check My Turn for More Availability](https://myturn.ca.gov/) COVID-19 Vaccines Get the Facts Review safety information, common myths and more about the [available vaccines](/sites/sutterhealth/for-patients/health-alerts/about-the-covid-19-vaccines.page). After Your Vaccine [Side effects](/for-patients/health-alerts/after-covid-19-vaccine) include fever, body aches and fatigue. They're a sign your body is building protection.
